mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (employee_no, employee_pass, employee_name, employee_regi_no, employee_age, employee_gender, employee_telephone, employee_email, employee_address, employee_detail_address ) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, #{employeePass}, #{employeeName}, #{employeeRegiNo}, #{employeeAge}, #{employeeGender}, #{employeeTelephone}, #{employeeEmail}, #{employeeAddress}, #{employeeDetailAddress} )
